title: Video: Pusha T ft. Tyler, The Creator – Trouble On My Mind
body:
Whatever you think of ‘**Tyler, the creator**’, (I personally couldn’t give a fuck), the boy’s interesting; each piece of works he puts out seems commands attention.

The same was true of his collaboration with **Pusha-T** entitled, ‘_Trouble on my mind_’, when it dropped over a week ago. And now we have a video, a series of images containing the pair, ‘fucking shit’ up or even ‘getting up to no good’.

My biased opinion aside, I do get the feeling that the world Tyler so desperately wants us to invest in, is somewhat diluted through the inclusion of an outside influence. If you can’t see through Tyler’s play ground insults, perhaps this will be the recording that does it for you. Or, I could be a cynical fuck: you decide.
